name: 伊万·弗雷泽

last_movies.title: 丹·艾克罗伊德讲述奇闻异事 第一季

introduction: Ivan was born in August 2010 . Like many young actors, Ivan began his career as a model and by the age of seven had great experience. His first shoot, at the age of 6 months, was for national baby food commercial. And also he was trained in model and acting schools. In 2017, Ivan and his family moved to California. Ivan starred in several short films and episodic roles, as well in several TV commercials. In his free time, Ivan devotes himself in acting classes and improvement of his skills, he also loves swimming in the ocean and the pool, as well as cycling. And his biggest hobby is collecting Lego. Ivan traveled a lot with his family and visited many countries, but his main dream is to visit Japan, because he loves Japanese culture and language.
